channel.title: Automation on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Portfolio

item.title: Silent Debian Script
item.description: Introduction: I had wanted to learn linux for the longest time but never really got the opportunity as in a learning situation Windows was the operating system that was used, then same for the work placement. Which ment I got really comfortable using the Windows operating system.

item.title: Raspberry Pi Bash Project
item.description: Introduction: To further my career and learning, and the installation of the Raspberry Pi Cluster. I looked into creating a bash script, that would automate the process as much as possible to reduce the amount of time that it took to setup and install all of the machines. Something that I would like to look into in the future is the addition of a deployment server that install the OS automatically across the network of machines. I currently have no idea how Iâ€™d go about doing that so using a bash based automated process.
